body_html: @karllessard can we expect tf.train.Example, tf.python_io.TFRecordWriter, tf.train.Feature and other tf.train.* types wrappers? This impl will blow up everyone, since it will shut the hole in Spark <-> Tensorflow integration. Until higher level api will be implemented in java.

body: @karllessard can we expect tf.train.Example, tf.python_io.TFRecordWriter, tf.train.Feature and other tf.train.* types wrappers? This impl will blow up everyone, since it will shut the hole in Spark <-> Tensorflow integration. Until higher level api will be implemented in java.
